title: Hello Neighbor: RTX
description: Hello Neighbor RTX will initially feature a remake of Alpha 2, including the following: -RTX for realistic reflections, shadows, and lighting. -A completely reworked art style that preserves the spirit of the original while enhancing detail and vibrancy. Improved game aspects: -A more advanced neighbor AI that is even craftier and more cunning. -Enhanced physics and animation, ensuring immersive gameplay. -A new system for interacting with the environment and objects. Expanded story: -A deep narrative, referencing the old canon, that unveils secrets about the neighbor and his house. Redesigned levels: -Enlarged exploration areas with new mysteries and puzzles. -Added unique gameplay mechanics to expand players’ possibilities. Many delightful additions: -Unique gameplay elements not found in the original version. Furthermore, there’s the possibility of a full rework of the original game in this new style and gameplay after the remake. The release is expected around fall 2025.
